## harp-geojson-datasource package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [GeoJsonDataSource](./harp-geojson-datasource.geojsondatasource.md) | <code>GeoJsonDataSource</code> is used for the visualization of geometric objects provided in the GeoJSON format. To be able to render GeoJSON data, a <code>GeoJsonDataSource</code> instance must be added to the \[\[MapView\]\] instance.
```typescript
   const geoJsonDataProvider = new GeoJsonDataProvider(
       "italy",
       new URL("resources/italy.json", window.location.href)
   );
   const geoJsonDataSource = new GeoJsonDataSource({
       dataProvider: geoJsonDataProvider,
       styleSetName: "geojson"
   });
   mapView.addDataSource(geoJsonDataSource);

```
 |
